DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the efficacy and safety of oral phosphate (Z-521) in subjects with primary hypophosphatemic rickets.
DOC.brief_title: Therapeutic Use of Oral Sodium Phosphate (Z-521) in Primary Hypophosphatemic Rickets
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed as primary hypophosphatemic rickets based on familial history, genetic test or laboratory test results. A hyperparathyroidism
